articles.description: The rollout of AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine, the shot much of the world is relying on to beat the pandemic, faced further complications on Thursday as India halted exports of the vaccine and Europe discussed its own export controls.
articles.title: AstraZeneca vaccine's global rollout faces more complications - Reuters
